explore_legal_alternatives.title: Emergency Legal Protocols
explore_legal_alternatives.description: The Assembly's legal clerk reveals dusty emergency protocols: 'In theory, emergency powers can be granted without the missing delegates—but only if we can prove their disappearance was directly related to the crisis. And the evidence suggests all these problems—trade wars, transport failures, harmonic disruptions—are coordinated attacks on our infrastructure.'

choices.text: 'Then we need proof these crises are connected.'
'I'll investigate the delegates to get that proof.'
'I need to coordinate with other crisis response teams.'

explore_trader_alliance.title: Seeds of Cooperation
explore_trader_alliance.description: You gather the independent traders in a circle. Kess speaks up: 'We've been competing with each other while they destroy us. But together? We have expertise they lack - personal relationships, flexibility, local knowledge. If we coordinate our resources and share routes, we might survive this.'

choices.text: 'You'll need legal protection from Cartel retaliation.'
'This could work, but you'll need startup capital.'
'Let me consider all options before committing.'
